code: var getCurrentDate=function getCurrentDate(){var separator=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:"      ";var newDate=new Date();var date=newDate.getDate();var month=newDate.getMonth()+1;var year=newDate.getFullYear();var hours=newDate.getHours();var mintues=newDate.getMinutes();var seconds=newDate.getSeconds();return"".concat(year,"/").concat(month<10?"0".concat(month):"".concat(month),"/").concat(date).concat(separator).concat(hours,":").concat(mintues,":").concat(seconds);};export default getCurrentDate;
